markdownRemark.html:
CNC

If you produce your own wood type. It’s best to take pear wood («Stirnholz») pear. I also saw good examples made with «Filmbeschichtete Birkensperrholzplatte» (Formica/Resopal) p98a

  1. I saw 2017 examplex made by Marko in Ljubljana. Awesome!

    ↩

  2. I saw 2016 examplex made by P98a in Berlin.

    ↩
